summary: Unleash the Rylan Star Leagues greatest spell!
descriptionHtml:
[center]
You in the mood for some 80's retro son
Well I got ya covered
[youtube]e8zIOgeISQI[/youtube]


As usual Discworld videos
[youtube]FEBNe8XINd0[/youtube]



[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]


[/center]
Adds a rather large spell tome on top of the winterhold mage guild
Must have been dropped after a epic space battle or something
This spell is a weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee bit overpowered, so I made the player able to be hit by it
Firing this indoors is ill advised, won't bug anything out but it will devastate and vaporize everything
It is completely random, it fires in 25 different directions rotating so a almost infinite possibilitys as the starting rotation is determined by the projectile impact point
It spawns the emitter 100 units over impact point

Now get out there and defeat the Ko-Dan Armada!
author: darren83
